1. loading malaria
```{r}
malaria <- read_csv("data/malaria.csv")
```
```{r}
clean_names(malaria)
```
```{r}
```


```{r}
malaria_long <- malaria %>% 
  pivot_longer(-c(location_name, data_date,submitted_date, Province,District, newid),
               names_to = "age class",
               values_to = "cases")

malaria_long
```

```{r}
malaria_long %>% 
  filter(data_date == "2020-07-30") %>% 
  group_by(District) %>% 
  summarise(tot_cases = sum(cases, na.rm=T)) %>% 
  arrange(-tot_cases)
```
